# Using Alpha Vantage API
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(alphavantager)

av_api_key(Sys.getenv("ALPHAVANTAGE_API_KEY"))
data=av_get("SPY", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY", interval = "5min", outputsize = "full")

write.csv(data,"~/SPY.csv", row.names = T) #saves to onedrive documents
```

- SPY = S&P500 
- SMI = Swiss Market Index
- VTHR = Russell 3000 (US)
